T02D3766:119b-1: bodhi pa d'a ti n'a ma /
T02D3766:119b-3: byang chub kyi gzhung lam zhes bya ba /
T02D3766:119b-4: sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3766:119b-5: thub pa che la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3766:119b-6: them skas lta bu'i lam gang yin //
T02D3766:119b-7: dbang po'i las chog rgyas pa las //
T02D3766:119b-8: snying po mdo ru bsdus te brjod //
T02D3766:119b-9: 'dir nges par sangs rgyas byon ba dang /
T02D3766:119b-11: dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3766:119b-12: dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gro dang /
T02D3766:119b-13: kla klo dang lha tshe ring por skye ba dang /
T02D3766:119b-14: sangs rgyas kyi gsung mi thos pa dang /
T02D3766:119b-16: dbang po ma tshang ba'i mtshan nyid can mi khom
T02D3766:119b-17: pa'i gnas brgyad las thar pa'i mi'i dngos po thob
T02D3766:119b-18: pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste /
T02D3766:119b-19: de thob par shes nas myur du sdig pa las
T02D3766:119b-20: byung ba'i dan 'gro'i sdug bsngal bsal zhing dge ba
T02D3766:119b-21: las byung ba'i bde 'gro'i dge ba mtha' dag dang
T02D3766:120a-0: / bde gshegs dang rgyal sras kyi phun sum tshogs pa rang dang gzhan gyis thob @120a * //
T02D3766:120a-1: par bya ba'i phyir shin tu dad pa dang snying
T02D3766:120a-2: brtse ba'i rang bzhin gyis bdag gis yang dag par
T02D3766:120a-4: cho gas dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa thob cing byang
T02D3766:120a-5: chub tu sems bskyed nas mchod rten bya ba la
T02D3766:120a-6: sogs pa dang po'i las rnams dang /
T02D3766:120a-7: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D3766:120a-8: drug gi bdag nyid la cho ga bzhin du go
T02D3766:120a-9: mas par bya'o // de nas sngar nyid kyi bla na med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo //
T02D3766:120a-10: de la aom na mo bha ga ba te bee ro tsa na prabha r'a dz'a ya /
T02D3766:120a-12: aarha te samya ksam buddh'a ya /
T02D3766:120a-14: aom s'u ksha me s'u ksha me /
T02D3766:120a-16: sh'ante d'ante aa sam'a ro pe aa na lam be /
T02D3766:120a-19: ma h'a te dze ni ra ku le nirba ne sarba buddha aa dhishsh'a na /
T02D3766:120a-21: gzungs 'dis sa'i gong bu'am bye ma'i gong bu la
T02D3766:120a-22: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mchod rten bya'o
T02D3766:120a-23: // de la rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa
T02D3766:120a-24: de snyed kyi mchod rten bye ba rnams byas par
T02D3766:120a-25: // 'gyur ro // rdul phra rab rnams kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120a-26: sa'i dbang phyug tu yang 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120a-27: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D3766:120a-28: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T02D3766:120a-29: bar 'gyur ro // de skad du bcom ldan 'das
T02D3766:120a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snad mdzad 'od kyi
T02D3766:120a-32: phan yon chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs so //
T02D3766:120a-33: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'a nata th'a ga to hya ba dat /
T02D3766:120a-34: te sh'a stsa yo ni rodha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra man:/
T02D3766:120a-35: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pas rab tu gnas pa byas nas /
T02D3766:120a-36: aom na mo bha ga ba te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
T02D3766:120a-38: aarha te samya ksam puddh'a ya /
T02D3766:120a-40: aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe pushpe /
T02D3766:120a-41: su pushpo da bha be pushpa sam bha be pushpa aa ba ki rni sv'a h'a //
T02D3766:120a-42: zhes pa'i gzungs 'dis lan bdun bsngags pa'i me tog dbul lo //
T02D3766:120a-43: me tog snyed de bye ba snyed kyi me tog phul bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02D3766:120a-44: de nas aom na mo bha ga ba te ratna ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
T02D3766:120a-46: aarha te samya kams buddh'a ya /
T02D3766:120a-48: aom ratne ratne ma h'a ratne ratna bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120a-49: zhes bya ba 'dis mchod rten la phyag bya'o //
T02D3766:120a-50: mchod rten gcig la phyag byas pas mchod rten bye ba la phyag byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120b-0: mchod rten @120b la phyag bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D3766:120b-1: de nas na ma:sa manha buddha n'am /
T02D3766:120b-2: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-3: zhes pa 'jim pa blang ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-4: aom badzrod bha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-5: zhes pa 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-6: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-7: zhes pa 'bru mar byug pa'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-8: aom dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-9: zhes skol phor du gzhug pa'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-10: aom badzra mungkar a'a ko ta ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-11: zhes pa brdung ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-12: aom dharm'a ba te sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-13: skol phor nas dbyung ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-14: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-15: zhes pa bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma ni shat d'i
T02D3766:120b-17: pa te dzv'a la dzv'a la dharma dh'a tu garbhe
T02D3766:120b-18: sv'a h'a / zhes pa rab tu gnas pa'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-19: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe a'a ha ra a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-20: zhes pa gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-21: aom a'a k'a sha dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-22: zhes pa bzod par gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D3766:120b-23: 'di ni s'a tstsha gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3766:120b-24: de'i rjes su na ma:sa manta buddha na'am aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02D3766:120b-25: aom ki ni ki ni ta th'ag ta audbha ba /
T02D3766:120b-26: sh'ante bar de autta ma autta ma /
T02D3766:120b-28: audbha ba h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-29: 'di bzung bas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdog zung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120b-30: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3766:120b-32: aom mu ni dharme sam gra ha dharme bi mukti
T02D3766:120b-33: dha rmes d'a aa mu gra ha dha rme bee
T02D3766:120b-34: shra ban pa ri barti ta dharme sarba k'a ra
T02D3766:120b-35: ya pa ri pra pan dharme /
T02D3766:120b-36: sa ma t'a pa ri barti ta dharme sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-37: aom pradzny'a shru ti smra ti bi dza ya dh'i dh'a ra ni ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-38: 'di bzung pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120b-39: na ma:sa manta buddha n'am aa bra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02D3766:120b-40: aom dhu na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-41: 'di bzung bas 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120b-42: na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02D3766:120b-43: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa re h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:120b-44: 'di bzung bas so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:120b-45: gzungs 'di dag dang tshigs su bcad pa la sogs
T02D3766:120b-46: pa bklags te phyag byas te de nas mchod rten
T02D3766:120b-47: la sogs pa mi 'jig pa'i sa phyogs su bzhugs
T02D3766:121a-1: phan yon yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod rten nam
T02D3766:121a-2: gzugs brnyan rnams la rdul phra rab ji snyed yod
T02D3766:121a-3: pa de snyed du nges par sa steng dang lha'i
T02D3766:121a-5: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum
T02D3766:121a-6: tshogs pa mtha' dag dang bde ba thams cad myong
T02D3766:121a-7: nas mthar skye ba dang rga ba'i rgud pa spangs
T02D3766:121a-8: te byang chub kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro
T02D3766:121a-9: // gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa las kyang /
T02D3766:121a-10: thub pa'i dbang po'i mchod rten byas pa yis //
T02D3766:121a-11: mya ngan rnams la lus kun rgyas shing brtan //
T02D3766:121a-12: gtso bor 'gyur zhing rin chen mdzod mang dang //
T02D3766:121a-13: sa steng dgra yi tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D3766:121a-15: de'i rjes su lag par bsgoms pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3766:121a-16: 'khor gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'i bhr'um la sogs pa'i
T02D3766:121a-17: sa bon lnga las byung ba'i rtag pa la sogs
T02D3766:121a-18: pa zhu ba dang lhan cig 'dres pa'i chu mdun
T02D3766:121a-19: du dzam las byung ba'i dzambha la ser po dung
T02D3766:121a-20: dang padma'i khar gter gyi ming can gyi gter bdag
T02D3766:121a-21: zhabs gnyis kyis mnan te bzhugs pa rdo rje nyi
T02D3766:121a-22: ma'i cod pan dang autpa la'i phreng ba can phyag
T02D3766:121a-23: gnyis na ne'u le dang b'i dza p'u ra bsnams
T02D3766:121a-24: pa bsams te / aom dzambha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:121a-25: zhes pas brgya rtsa brgyad de'i spyi bor mdzub mo brkyang pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3766:121a-26: dzambha la la tshu sbyin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3766:121a-27: aom dza la mi dam sarba pre te bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:121a-28: zhes pas yi dags thams cad la byams pas dmigs te chu sbyin no //
T02D3766:121a-29: de nas na ma:su r'u p'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya /
T02D3766:121a-30: aarha te samya ksam buddha ya /
T02D3766:121a-33: pra su r'u pra su r'u /
T02D3766:121a-36: sam bha ra sam bha ra /
T02D3766:121a-38: santar pa ya santar pa ya /
T02D3766:121a-39: sarba pre ta n'am sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:121a-40: gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zas la lan bdun
T02D3766:121a-41: yongs su bzlas te lag pa g-yon pas se gol
T02D3766:121a-42: gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas yi dags thams
T02D3766:121a-43: cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya
T02D3766:121a-44: zhing 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D3766:121a-45: skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig
T02D3766:121a-46: /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi
T02D3766:121a-47: dags rnams la bza' ba bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o
T02D3766:121a-48: zhes bya ba'o // zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3766:121b-0: de ltar na @121b yi dags thams cad la 'bras
T02D3766:121b-1: bre bo che re'i bza' ba so sor byin par
T02D3766:121b-2: 'gyur ro // de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:121b-4: stobs che ba dang mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' ba dang /
T02D3766:121b-5: phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:121b-6: tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /
T02D3766:121b-7: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D3766:121b-8: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
T02D3766:121b-9: ro // shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3766:121b-10: gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs so //
T02D3766:121b-11: nam:sa manta buddh'a n'am sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D3766:121b-12: ba lo ki ni sam bha ra si bha ra
T02D3766:121b-14: sngags 'di lan bdun brjod cing lag pa g-yas pa
T02D3766:121b-15: brkyang ba'i sor mo lnga po las rnam par byung
T02D3766:121b-16: ba'i bdud rtsi lnga'i rgyun gyis sgo'i rtsar gzhag pa'i
T02D3766:121b-17: chu dang bcas pa'i gtor ma'i bza' ba mngon par
T02D3766:121b-18: gang bas 'bru nyag ma re la yul ma ga
T02D3766:121b-19: dha'i bre bo che khal lnga tsam gyi bza' bar
T02D3766:121b-20: bltas la yi dags mtha' dag tshim par byed pa
T02D3766:121b-21: ni se gol lan gsum brdabs nas byang chub sems
T02D3766:121b-23: yi dags la chu sbyin pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3766:121b-24: de'i rjes su shar gyi lus 'phags dang /
T02D3766:121b-27: sgra mi snyan te gling bzhi'i rnam par dag pa zla kham dang /
T02D3766:121b-31: gzhan yang mngon par 'dod pa'i mandal gyi cho ga
T02D3766:121b-32: bzhin sangs rgyas la sogs pa rab tu mchod par
T02D3766:121b-33: bya'o // de la 'di ni cho ga ste /
T02D3766:121b-34: rkang pa bkru ba byas nas /
T02D3766:121b-35: aom a'a:badzra sn'a ni h'um zhes pas khrus bya ste /
T02D3766:121b-37: zhes pas lag pa bkru ba dang kha bshal ba byas nas /
T02D3766:121b-38: aom a'a:h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba'i cho ga bya ste /
T02D3766:121b-39: aom h'um zhes pas stan byin gyis rlabs nas /
T02D3766:121b-40: aom a'a:badzra bh'u mi mh'um zhes pas sa gzung bar bya ste /
T02D3766:121b-41: aom sarba ba ghn'am au tstsha r'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:121b-42: zhes pas mngon par bsngags pa'i srog chags med pa'i
T02D3766:121b-43: lci ba dang candan la sogs pas gtsang ba'i sa
T02D3766:121b-44: phyogs su mandal byug pa la sogs pa bya ste
T02D3766:121b-45: / aom a'a:badzra re khe h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis
T02D3766:121b-46: lag pa g-yon pas me tog gcig bzung ste lag
T02D3766:122a-0: / pa @122a * // g-yas pa'i rgyab kyi steng du bzhag nas mandal du dor ro //
T02D3766:122a-1: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishtha nt'u sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122a-2: zhes brjod de lag pa bkru'o //
T02D3766:122a-3: aom ma ni dha ri badzri n'i ma h'a pra
T02D3766:122a-4: ti sa re raksha mam h'um h'um phat phat sv'a
T02D3766:122a-5: h'a / zhes pa'i sngags kyis rang gi spyi bor me tog bzhag nas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3766:122a-6: mandal byas pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T02D3766:122a-7: yongs su rdzogs shing gser gyi mdor dang ldan pa
T02D3766:122a-8: la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob sta de ltar yang
T02D3766:122a-9: mandal gyi phan yon gyi mdo las /
T02D3766:122a-10: chu bcas lci ba sbyin pa ste //
T02D3766:122a-11: yang dag byug pa tshul khrims yin //
T02D3766:122a-12: grog sbur phra sel bzod pa ste //
T02D3766:122a-13: brtson 'grus bya ba byed la brtson //
T02D3766:122a-14: bsam gtan der sems rtse gcig byed //
T02D3766:122a-15: ri mo legs 'bar shes rab ste //
T02D3766:122a-16: pha rol phyin drug 'di rnams nyid //
T02D3766:122a-18: bde gshegs pho brang dam pa 'dir //
T02D3766:122a-19: lus kyi las rnams byas pas ni //
T02D3766:122a-20: gser gyi kha dog dang ldan zhing //
T02D3766:122a-21: nad kun las ni grol ba dang //
T02D3766:122a-22: zla ba ltar gsal yid 'ong ba'i //
T02D3766:122a-23: lha mi khyad par 'phags pa dang //
T02D3766:122a-24: nor dang gser ni phun tshogs pa'i //
T02D3766:122a-25: rgyal po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur //
T02D3766:122a-26: zhes pas mandal de nyid mngon par byugs te mandal
T02D3766:122a-27: la nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D3766:122a-28: pa dmigs nas / aom tsandra aarka bi la le sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122a-29: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis rlabs la dkyil 'khor
T02D3766:122a-30: der sna tshogs padma'i lte ba h'um las skyes pa'i
T02D3766:122a-31: mi bskyod pa sngon po sa la reg pa'i phyag
T02D3766:122a-32: rgya'o // shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la /
T02D3766:122a-33: aom tram hr'i kham las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3766:122a-36: don yod grub pa rnams dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang /
T02D3766:122a-37: byang chub mchog dang mchog sbyin dang bsam gtan dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya can rnams so //
T02D3766:122a-38: lda ka yang chos gos gsum dang gtsug tor dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D3766:122a-39: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su l'am m'am p'am t'am
T02D3766:122a-40: rnams yongs su gyur pa las spyan ma dang m'a
T02D3766:122a-41: ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams
T02D3766:122a-42: dkar ba dang sngo ba dang dmar ba dang ljang
T02D3766:122b-0: ba @122b dang ; pa rnams so // 'di rnams
T02D3766:122b-1: las rnam par snang mdzad zla ba la gnas pa
T02D3766:122b-2: gzhan rnams nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3766:122b-4: aom a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha bha ga w'a na aa ksho bhya badzra aa;/
T02D3766:122b-5: zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha
T02D3766:122b-6: rnams so so'i ming gzhug pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3766:122b-7: spyan drang ngo // aom na mo aa ksho bhy'a ya h'um /
T02D3766:122b-8: aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-9: so sor lan gsum gsum dbul lo //
T02D3766:122b-10: aom na mo bee ro tsa n'a ya aom aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um h'a /
T02D3766:122b-11: aom na mo ratna sam bha p'a ya tr'am /
T02D3766:122b-12: aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-13: aom na mo aa mi ta pra bh'a b'a ya hr'i;/
T02D3766:122b-14: aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-15: aom na mo aa mo gha siddha ye kham /
T02D3766:122b-16: aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-17: aom na mo lo tsa na lam /
T02D3766:122b-18: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-19: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-20: aom na ma:panta ra yi bam /
T02D3766:122b-21: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-22: aom na ma st'a ra yee t'am /
T02D3766:122b-23: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-24: slar yang mi bskyod pa la me tog mang po khyad par du dbul lo //
T02D3766:122b-26: aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-27: aom a'a:badzra dh'u ppe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-28: aom a'a:badzra d'i ppe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-29: aom a'a:badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-30: aom a'a:badzra ni bi tye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:122b-31: zhes nye bar spyod pa lnga yang dag par dbul lo //
T02D3766:122b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza me gha
T02D3766:122b-33: pra sa ra sa mu dra sba ra na hi
T02D3766:122b-34: mam ga gan kham h'um zhes pas mchod pa rnams
T02D3766:122b-36: nus pa med na yid las byung ba'i mchod pa chen po rnams bya ste /
T02D3766:122b-38: gos dang rgyal mtshan dang nor bu dang mu tig
T02D3766:122b-39: gi do shal la sogs pa rgyan gyi bye brag
T02D3766:122b-40: rnams dang / padma dang autpal la sogs pa me tog gi bye brag rnams dang /
T02D3766:122b-41: sku chings dang chos gos dang lhung bzed dang bsil
T02D3766:122b-42: byed la sogs pa yo byad kyi bye brag rnams
T02D3766:122b-43: dang / gling bzhi dang nye ba'i gling rnams rin
T02D3766:122b-44: po che sna bdun la sogs pas bkang nas dbul
T02D3766:122b-45: dang / lo // de nas mchod pa mngon par
T02D3766:122b-46: 'phrul par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan
T02D3766:122b-48: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am sarba th'a
T02D3766:122b-49: autga te sba ra na hi mam ga ga na
T02D3766:123a-0: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang @123a * //
T02D3766:123a-1: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du mchod pa'i sprin
T02D3766:123a-2: rnams ji ltar bsams pa bzhin bden par gnas par
T02D3766:123a-3: 'gyur ro // sku khrus kyi mchod pa yang /
T02D3766:123a-4: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:123a-5: zhes pas sku khrus byas la sngar bzhin mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3766:123a-6: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba chos kyi dbyings
T02D3766:123a-7: su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3766:123a-8: 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la bdag nyid dbul bar
T02D3766:123a-9: bgyi'o // rnam pa thams cad dang dus thams cad
T02D3766:123a-10: du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyed rnams
T02D3766:123a-11: kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D3766:123a-13: dngos grub dang mchog bdag la rab tu stsol cig ces pas bdag nyid dbul ba dang /
T02D3766:123a-15: sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3766:123a-16: skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3766:123a-18: gsum rnams la yang rtag phyag 'chal //
T02D3766:123a-19: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3766:123a-20: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3766:123a-21: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3766:123a-22: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3766:123a-23: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02D3766:123a-24: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02D3766:123a-25: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D3766:123a-26: byang chub kyi ni sems 'di bgyi //
T02D3766:123a-27: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02D3766:123a-28: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du bgyi //
T02D3766:123a-29: byang chub mchog gi spyod pa yid 'ong spyad //
T02D3766:123a-30: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
T02D3766:123a-31: ces gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs bcad bklag
T02D3766:123a-32: par bya'o // de nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D3766:123a-33: gang zhig thog ma dbus mtha' med zhi sangs rgyas nyid rang rnams //
T02D3766:123a-34: sangs rgyas nas ni ma lus rtogs phyir 'jigs med rtag pa'i lam ston pa //
T02D3766:123a-35: mkhyen brtse'i ral gri rdo rje mchog bsnams sdug bsngal myu gu gcod mdzad cing //
T02D3766:123a-36: sna tshogs lta thabs kyis bskor the tshom rtsig pa 'jig mdzad de la 'dud //
T02D3766:123a-37: ces pa la sogs pas so //
T02D3766:123a-38: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D3766:123a-39: la bden par bstod pa nye bar 'byung bar byed
T02D3766:123b-0: pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad brjod @123b
T02D3766:123b-1: par bya'o // na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a
T02D3766:123b-2: n'am sarba tra si ku su mi ta aa bhi
T02D3766:123b-3: dzny'a r'a si ni na mo stu te sv'a h'a
T02D3766:123b-5: bdag skye ba nas skye bar sangs rgyas la gus pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-6: rang bzhin gyis g-yo med pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-7: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-8: gtong ba la goms pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-10: bu la phyir phyogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems thob
T02D3766:123b-11: par gyur cig / shes rab rno ba dang rigs
T02D3766:123b-14: bde gshegs kyi snyan dngags rgya chen po la mkhas
T02D3766:123b-15: par gyur cig / tshe ring zhing ris su skye
T02D3766:123b-16: ba dang / skyes bu blo gros sgrim zhing mkhas pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-17: dbang po ma nyams pa bde zhing snying rje dang bcas pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-18: rab tu dang zhing snyan dngags mkhas pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-19: pha ma byas pa shes shing gus pa nyid dang /
T02D3766:123b-20: rtag tu skye ba dran zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-23: rab tu sbyin pa la nges par dga' ba dang /
T02D3766:123b-24: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-25: spro zhing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-26: yid du 'ong zhing mang po dga' ba dang /
T02D3766:123b-27: nad thams cad spangs shing sems can la brtse ba
T02D3766:123b-28: can thos pa 'dzin cing bsam pa dag pa dang
T02D3766:123b-29: / gtsang spra dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3766:123b-30: ji srid 'jig rten la phan pa 'byung ba'i phyir
T02D3766:123b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi go 'phang ma
T02D3766:123b-32: thob kyi bar de srid du bdag yon tan 'di
T02D3766:123b-33: rnams kun gyis brgyan par gyur cig ces smon lam
T02D3766:123b-34: btab ste / phan yon chen po dang ldan pa
T02D3766:123b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sangs
T02D3766:123b-36: rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i yi ge
T02D3766:123b-37: brgya pa sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bzla bar bya'o
T02D3766:123b-38: btab ste / // na ma stri ya dh'i k'a n'am /
T02D3766:123b-40: sarba tra aa pra ti ha t'a b'a ba ti dharma ta ba lin'am /
T02D3766:123b-41: aom am am sa ma sa ma sa manta to
T02D3766:123b-42: aa na nt'a b'a pa ti sh'a sa ni ha
T02D3766:123b-43: ra ha ra / sma ra sma ra ni /
T02D3766:123b-44: bi ga ta r'a ga / buddha dharma te /
T02D3766:123b-49: ga ga na ma h'a ba ra laksha ne dzv'a
T02D3766:123b-50: la dzv'a la na s'a ga re sv'a h'a zhes
T02D3766:123b-52: phyogs rnams kun na lus dang sems //
T02D3766:123b-53: sdug bsngal nad pa ji snyed pa //
T02D3766:123b-54: de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyis //
T02D3766:124a-0: bde dga' rgya mtsho thob par shog / lha yang dus su char @124a * //
T02D3766:124a-2: lo tog phun sum tshogs par shog / rgyal po
T02D3766:124a-3: chos bzhin byed gyur cig /'jig rten dag kyang dar
T02D3766:124a-4: bar shog / ngan song sdug bsngal ma myong zhing
T02D3766:124a-5: // dka' ba spyad pa med par yang //
T02D3766:124a-6: lha bas lhag pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02D3766:124a-7: de dag sangs rgyas myur grub /
T02D3766:124a-8: shog ; ces pa la sogs pa bklags nas /
T02D3766:124a-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T02D3766:124a-10: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sangs
T02D3766:124a-11: rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
T02D3766:124a-12: mkhyen cing gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D3766:124a-13: de rigs gang yin pa dang sde gang dang ci
T02D3766:124a-14: 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang dang mtshan nyid gang
T02D3766:124a-15: dang / chos nyid gang gis gnas pa de bzhin
T02D3766:124a-16: du dge ba'i rtsa ba de la rjes su yi
T02D3766:124a-17: dang / rang ngo // ji ltar yang de bzhin
T02D3766:124a-18: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D3766:124a-19: sangs rgyas de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mngon par
T02D3766:124a-20: shes pas yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du ge
T02D3766:124a-21: ba'i rtsa ba de dag bdag gis kyang bla na
T02D3766:124a-22: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T02D3766:124a-23: yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod do //
T02D3766:124a-24: rjes su yi rang ba dang bsngo ba'i rjes la /
T02D3766:124a-25: ao sarba ta th'a ga ta su la li ta
T02D3766:124a-26: na mi te n'a ma mi bha ga b'a na
T02D3766:124a-27: tam aa ksho bhya n'a tham dza:h'um bam ho:pra t'i
T02D3766:124a-28: tstsha ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho zhas
T02D3766:124a-31: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D3766:124a-32: rjes mthun dngos grub stsal nas kyang //
T02D3766:124a-33: slar yang 'byon par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D3766:124a-34: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D3766:124a-35: aom mu:sv'a h'a zhes pas gshegs su gsol par bya'o //
T02D3766:124a-36: de nas mandal gyi ri mo dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D3766:124a-37: mchod pa'i phan yon yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dad
T02D3766:124a-38: pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo
T02D3766:124a-39: las gsungs te / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs
T02D3766:124a-40: kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten
T02D3766:124a-41: gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rang
T02D3766:124a-42: sangs rgyas rnams la nyin dang nyin la ro bya
T02D3766:124a-43: rgya pa'i kha zas dang lha rdzas gyi na bza'
T02D3766:124a-44: las gsungs te / rnams byin zhing / de bzhin
T02D3766:124a-45: du gangg'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal par
T02D3766:124a-46: las gsungs te / rnams byin zhing / byin pa
T02D3766:124a-47: dang / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
T02D3766:124b-0: mo gzhan zhig gis ri mo mkhan @124b gyis bris
T02D3766:124b-1: pa'i sangs rgyas sam glegs bam du byas pa mthong
T02D3766:124b-2: nas 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches grangs med
T02D3766:124b-3: pa bskyed na slar yang gang zhig thal mo sbyor
T02D3766:124b-4: ba'am me tog gam spos sam /
T02D3766:124b-5: mar me dbul bar byed na /
T02D3766:124b-6: 'di nyid de bas de bsod nams mchog tu grangs med pa bskyed pa lta ci smos zhes so //
T02D3766:124b-7: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D3766:124b-8: sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu ni //
T02D3766:124b-9: 'dod yon lnga dang nyer spyod lngas //
T02D3766:124b-10: cho ga bzhin du mchod byed na //
T02D3766:124b-14: gang zhig bzhugs la mchod pa dang //
T02D3766:124b-15: gang zhig mya ngan 'das pa la //
T02D3766:124b-16: mnyam pa'i sems kyis rab dad na //
T02D3766:124b-17: bsod nams khyad par med pa yin //
T02D3766:124b-19: dge ba'i las byed pa 'di ni gnyen po kun du spyod pa'o //
T02D3766:124b-20: dge ba'i las rnams byed pa ni don la mngon par sbyor ba'i bo'o //
T02D3766:124b-21: yang na sngar bzhin byas pa'i mandal gyi dbus su
T02D3766:124b-22: rang 'dod pa'i lha 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs
T02D3766:124b-23: pa de dang de'i rang gi sa bon las byung
T02D3766:124b-24: ba stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa
T02D3766:124b-25: byang chub kyi sems su ro gcig pa sangs rgyas
T02D3766:124b-26: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ngo bo
T02D3766:124b-28: sngar bzhin spyan drangs nas de'i cod pan la 'od
T02D3766:124b-29: pag med la sogs pa rigs kyi gtso bo bskyed
T02D3766:124b-30: nas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du lha thams
T02D3766:124b-31: cad gnas ji lta bar dmigs te /
T02D3766:124b-32: sngar bzhin mchod pa dang bstod pa dang sngags kyis mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya'o //
T02D3766:124b-33: mthar na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satva bhya:/
T02D3766:124b-34: sarba bita pu ra pu ra s'u ra s'u ra /
T02D3766:124b-35: a'a bart'a y'a bart'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:124b-36: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod
T02D3766:124b-37: pa dang nye gnas dang zhabs la spyi bos phyag
T02D3766:124b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3766:124b-40: dam pa'i chos bklag pa la sogs pa'i don du
T02D3766:124b-41: sngags pas rkang pa la sogs pa bkru ba dang
T02D3766:124b-42: / kha bshal ba la sogs pa byas nas bde ba'i stan la gnas te /
T02D3766:124b-43: aom badzra satva sarba bi gha na aud sa ra
T02D3766:124b-44: h'um phat ces pa'i sngags kyis sa gzhi byin gyis
T02D3766:124b-45: brlabs te dri bzang po la sogs pas mandal zlum
T02D3766:125a-1: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pa 'dis byin gyis
T02D3766:125a-2: brlabs te mandal du me tog cig bzhag nas lag
T02D3766:125a-3: pa bkru'o // de nas mandal de'i dbus su ri
T02D3766:125a-4: rab gru bzhi pa la rtse mo brgyad kyis nye
T02D3766:125a-5: pa bkru'o // bar mdzes pa / shar dang lho
T02D3766:125a-6: dang nub dang byang gi ngos rnams ni bee d'urya
T02D3766:125a-7: dang shel dang padma r'a ga dang gser gyi bdag
T02D3766:125a-8: nyid de rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3766:125a-9: de'i mdun du zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa shar gyi lus 'phags dang /
T02D3766:125a-10: g-yas su gru gsum pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang /
T02D3766:125a-11: rgyab tu yongs su zlum po'i ba lang spyod dang /
T02D3766:125a-12: g-yon du grub bzhi pa'i sgra mi snyan no //
T02D3766:125a-13: shar du lus 'phags la sogs pa dang nye bar lus dang lus 'phags dang /
T02D3766:125a-14: g-yo ldan dang lam mchog 'gro dang /
T02D3766:125a-15: rnga yang dang rnga yab gzhan dang /
T02D3766:125a-16: sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla zhes
T02D3766:125a-17: pa nye ba'i gling rnams te so sor padma r'a
T02D3766:125a-18: ga dang aindra n'i la dang bee d'urya dang margat
T02D3766:125a-19: dang rdo rje dang mu tig dang byi ru la
T02D3766:125a-20: sogs pas yongs su bkang ba'o //
T02D3766:125a-21: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su glang po skyes pa dang rta dang btsun mo rnams so //
T02D3766:125a-22: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ral gri dang 'khor
T02D3766:125a-23: lo dang nor bu dang gter chen po rnams bsams
T02D3766:125a-24: te sngar phul ba'i me tog bsal la /
T02D3766:125a-25: aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes pa 'dis bsngags te ri
T02D3766:125a-26: rab dang gling dang nye ba'i gling dang glang po
T02D3766:125a-27: la sogs pa rin po che dang gter chen po
T02D3766:125a-28: rnams su me tog dbul lo //
T02D3766:125a-29: aom badzra dh'u ppe h'um zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D3766:125a-30: sngags kyis bdug spos la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor
T02D3766:125a-32: de nas mchod pa thams cad cho ga bzhin de
T02D3766:125a-33: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i bdag
T02D3766:125a-34: nyid dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam yang mandal gyi
T02D3766:125a-35: dbus su bzhugs te ji lta ba bzhin bklag go
T02D3766:125a-36: // lha'i steng du ni ma yin no //
T02D3766:125a-37: de nas yang mchod pa'i cho ga ni bla ma
T02D3766:125a-38: dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
T02D3766:125a-40: rang 'dod pa'i lha stong nyid snying rje dbyer med
T02D3766:125a-41: pa'i byang chub kyi sems su ro gcig la de
T02D3766:125a-42: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor mos te
T02D3766:125a-43: / rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i seng
T02D3766:125a-44: ge'i gdan dang padma la rdo rje sems dpa'i rol
T02D3766:125b-0: mchod pa dbul zhing bstod pa @125b bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3766:125b-1: aom a'a:shr'i man badzra gu ru tsa ra na ka
T02D3766:125b-2: ma l'a ya sa myag dzny'a na aa ba bh'a
T02D3766:125b-3: sa ka r'a ya na ma:h'um /
T02D3766:125b-4: gang gi sku drin 'od kyis gsal byas bdag nyid kyi //
T02D3766:125b-5: de nyid rin chen 'od kyi tshogs kyis mun bcom ste //
T02D3766:125b-6: mthong ba skyon med bdag rnams rol pas lhag ltab //
T02D3766:125b-7: bla ma nyi ma de la gus pas phyag 'di 'tshal //
T02D3766:125b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis mdzad pas bla ma la phyag bya'o //
T02D3766:125b-9: sngar bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste /
T02D3766:125b-10: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D3766:125b-11: rjes mthun dngos grub stsal nas kyang //
T02D3766:125b-12: slar yang 'byon par bya ba'i phyir ;
T02D3766:125b-13: / sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D3766:125b-14: mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3766:125b-15: 'di ni dam pa'i chos dang lha dang bla ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3766:125b-16: gzhan du ni mandal zlum po'i dbus su ri rab
T02D3766:125b-17: la sogs pa dang rang gis bon las bskyed nas
T02D3766:125b-18: mchod pa'i sngags kyang so sor gsungs pa de dag
T02D3766:125b-19: gis me tog la sogs pa dbul te /
T02D3766:125b-20: de la aom h'um h'a mer be na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-21: de'i steng du aom ham suksha ma mer be na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-23: de'i rjes la aom am p'u ra ba bi de h'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-24: aom ram dzam bu dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-25: aom lam aa pa ra go d'a n'i ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-26: aom bam autta ra ku ra /
T02D3766:125b-28: aom ya au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-29: aom ra au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-30: aom la au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-31: aom wa au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-32: aom ya ga dza ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-33: aom ra:pu ru sha ratna ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-34: aom la aa shva ratna ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-35: aom wa str'i ratn'a ya na ma /
T02D3766:125b-36: aom ya:khadga ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-37: aom rtsakra ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-38: aom la ma h'a ma ni ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D3766:125b-39: aom wa ma h'a ni dhi bhyon ma:/
T02D3766:125b-41: gzhan thams cad sngar bzhin no //
T02D3766:125b-42: 'di dag thams cad med kyang phyi rol gyi dngos
T02D3766:125b-43: por rab tu dang ba'i dngos po rang gi kun
T02D3766:125b-44: rtog gis dpag bsam shing las byung ba dbul te
T02D3766:125b-45: 'bras bu shin tu che ba nyid du 'gyur ro
T02D3766:125b-46: // rdzas kyi dngos po dngos su yod pa la
T02D3766:125b-47: yang sems g-yeng ba dang zhen bdag gis 'bul ba
T02D3766:125b-48: ni 'bras bu cung zad med ces lung las te
T02D3766:125b-50: bzlas brjod dang ni dka' thub kun //
T02D3766:125b-51: yun ring dus su spyad byas kyang //
T02D3766:126a-1: g-yeng zhen pas byas pa ni //
T02D3766:126a-2: thams cad rig pas don med gsungs //
T02D3766:126a-4: de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi ston mo dang gtsug lag khang gi mchod yon sbyin pa dang /
T02D3766:126a-5: chos kyi mchod yon sbyin pa la yang dge 'dun
T02D3766:126a-6: la sogs pa ri rab kyi steng du gtso bor
T02D3766:126a-7: byas te bzhugs nas mchod par bya'i /
T02D3766:126a-8: gang gang gang tshe 'tsho bya ba //
T02D3766:126a-9: dag pa'i 'tsho ba des bsgrub sta //
T02D3766:126a-10: bkres skom nad ni zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D3766:126a-11: zas skom sman dang 'dra bar bsam //
T02D3766:126a-12: de yang drag shul can gyis zhus pa las /
T02D3766:126a-13: khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa
T02D3766:126a-14: chos dad mthun pas longs spyod de tshol zhing chos
T02D3766:126a-15: ma yin pas mi tshol na yang dag pa'i 'tsho
T02D3766:126a-16: bar 'gyur te log pa'i 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro
T02D3766:126a-17: zhes so // de nas ji ltar rnyed pa'i zas
T02D3766:126a-18: la gtor ma dang lha bshos dang 'phrog ma dang
T02D3766:126a-19: phud kyi chang bu dang lhag ma ste lnga po
T02D3766:126a-20: 'bras bu chen por longs spyod pa'i phyir rtag tu
T02D3766:126a-21: zhes so // sbyin no ; / de nas aom a'a: h'um lan gsum brjod nas /
T02D3766:126a-22: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D3766:126a-23: a'ady'a nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D3766:126a-24: aom a'a: badzra nee bi tye h'um zhes pas lha bshos so //
T02D3766:126a-25: aom h'a ri te ma h'a badzra ya kshi ni
T02D3766:126a-26: ha ra har sarba p'a pa ni kshi sv'a h'a
T02D3766:126a-27: zhes pas 'phrog ma la zan gyi chang bu gnyis
T02D3766:126a-28: sbyin no // aom aa gra pinta aa si bhya:sv'a h'a zhes pas phud kyi chang bu'o //
T02D3766:126a-29: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am /
T02D3766:126a-30: aom pa lim ta de te dzo ba li ni sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
T02D3766:126a-31: aom a'a:h'um zhes pas bza' ba la lan brgyang mngon par bsngags te /
T02D3766:126a-32: dang por mthe bong dang ming med kyis reg nas
T02D3766:126a-33: bza' ste dug la sogs pa'i nyes pa zhi bar
T02D3766:126a-34: byed do // kha bkang sgra dang bcas pa dang
T02D3766:126a-35: kha gdangs pa dang ha cang myur ba dang bul
T02D3766:126a-36: bas mi bza' ste phan pa dang ran pas so
T02D3766:126a-37: byed do // // aom autsitshashta pinta aa shi bhya:sv'a
T02D3766:126a-38: h'a zhes pa 'dis lhag ma'i chang bu sbyin no
T02D3766:126a-39: byed do // // // zas lhag mched du ma
T02D3766:126a-40: byas pa kho nar sbyin zhing kha bkru ba la
T02D3766:126a-41: sogs pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi
T02D3766:126a-42: nang na gnas pa'am khyim gyi gnas las nges par
T02D3766:126a-43: byung ba'i rab tu byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D3766:126a-44: mtha' dag na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams kyi dge
T02D3766:126a-46: rgyal po sbyin bdag nyid dang ni //
T02D3766:126b-0: gang yang @126b sems can tshogs gzhan rnams //
T02D3766:126b-1: tsho dang nad med phun sum tshogs //
T02D3766:126b-2: rtag tu bde dang ldan gyur cig / sbyin pas 'byung po dbang du 'gyur //
T02D3766:126b-3: spyin pas dgra rnams med par 'gyur //
T02D3766:126b-4: pha rol gnyen yang sbyin pa nyid //
T02D3766:126b-5: de phyir sbyin pa gtso bor brjod //
T02D3766:126b-6: sbyin pa 'jig rten rgyan yin te ;
T02D3766:126b-7: / sbyin pas ngan 'gro zlog par byed //
T02D3766:126b-8: sbyin pa mtho ris skas yin te //
T02D3766:126b-9: sbyin pa zhi byed dge ba'o //
T02D3766:126b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rnams //
T02D3766:126b-11: mi zad nam mkha' lta bu gang //
T02D3766:126b-12: longs spyod de ni thob bya'i phyir //
T02D3766:126b-13: sbyin pa de ni yang dag spel //
T02D3766:126b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02D3766:126b-15: gzhan du mu stegs rnams la gus pa la sogs
T02D3766:126b-16: pa mi bya ste de yang skyabs gsum bdun cu
T02D3766:126b-18: dge bsnyen du ni dam bcas nas //
T02D3766:126b-19: skyabs gsum po ni bsrung bar bya //
T02D3766:126b-20: mu stegs gzhan la gus pa dang //
T02D3766:126b-21: phyag dang mchod pa rnams mi bya //
T02D3766:126b-23: brgyad stong pa las kyang lha gzhan rnams la me
T02D3766:126b-24: tog dang bdug spos dang mar me rnams sbyin par
T02D3766:126b-25: mi bya ri mor mi bya zhes so //
T02D3766:126b-26: de nas na ma:sa manta bra bha r'a dz'a ya ta th'ag t'a ya /
T02D3766:126b-28: na mo manydzu shr'i ku m'a ra bh'u t'a ya bo dhi sa tv'a ya /
T02D3766:126b-30: ma h'a k'a ru nik'a ya /
T02D3766:126b-32: aom ni r'a lambhe ni r'a bh'a se /
T02D3766:126b-33: dza ye dza ya la bdhe ma h'a ma te
T02D3766:126b-34: dakshe dakshi n'am pa ri sho dh'a ya sv'a h'a
T02D3766:126b-35: / gang gzungs 'di lan gcig rjod par byed pa
T02D3766:126b-36: de ri rab tsam gyi bsod nams yang yongs su
T02D3766:126b-37: sbyong bar 'gyur ro zhes pa bsod nams yongs su
T02D3766:126b-38: sbyong ba'i gzungs brjod par bya'o //
T02D3766:126b-39: mtshan mo'i dang po mi nyal bar dam pa'i chos
T02D3766:126b-40: kyi kha ton dang bzlas pa la sogs pa byas
T02D3766:126b-41: nas nyal ba na mal du yan lag thams cad
T02D3766:126b-42: btud pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D3766:126b-43: cad la phyag bya zhing gsol ba yang btab nas
T02D3766:126b-44: nyal te / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3766:126b-45: thams cad kyis bdag la byin kyis brlab tu gsol
T02D3766:126b-46: nyal te / / bla na med pa'i dngos grub
T02D3766:126b-47: dang mchog bdag la stsol cig / nye bar 'tshe
T02D3766:126b-48: ba thams cad kyang med par mdzad du gsol zhes
T02D3766:126b-49: nyal te / / pa dang / rang gi 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D3766:126b-50: na mo bha ga ba te a'arya pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta yi /
T02D3766:127a-0: sarba ta th'a ga t'a pa @127a * //
T02D3766:127a-1: ri mi t'a p'u ri ta ye /
T02D3766:127a-5: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
T02D3766:127a-11: a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha bha ga pa ti m'a bi la mba sv'a h'a /
T02D3766:127a-12: gzungs 'dis lag pa g-yas pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te /
T02D3766:127a-13: de'i steng du mgo gzhag ste seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal lo //
T02D3766:127a-14: mtshan mo tha ma nas de bzhin du yid ma
T02D3766:127a-15: yengs pa dang rgyun chad pa med par yi dam
T02D3766:127a-16: mtha' dag bya'o // de ltar nyin re zhing byas
T02D3766:127a-17: na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo myur du
T02D3766:127a-20: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02D3766:127a-21: bsam gtan la sogs rtag brten bya //
T02D3766:127a-22: dus ni yun mi ring ba yis //
T02D3766:127a-23: byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D3766:127a-25: gzhung bsdus pa yi bsod nams las kyis ni //
T02D3766:127a-26: bdag cag byang chub gzhung lam 'di brten nas //
T02D3766:127a-27: spro bas sna tshogs spyod pa spyad nas ni //
T02D3766:127a-28: skye bos bla med go 'phang thob par shog /
T02D3766:127a-29: byang chub gzhung lam zhes bgyi ba slob dpon mkhas
T02D3766:127a-30: pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas spas pas mdzad
T02D3766:127a-32: / ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bsdus pa ste gzhung
T02D3766:127a-33: gi tshad ni shlo ka sum brgya nyi shu rtsa
T02D3766:127a-34: lnga'o // dang po'i las kyi bya ba ma brten par //
T02D3766:127a-35: nges par byang chub thob mi nus kyang //
T02D3766:127a-36: rtsod dus skye bo stong pa nyid smra zhing //
T02D3766:127a-37: gzhung lam dang po'i las kyi bya ba rnams //
T02D3766:127a-38: mi shes mi nus mi byed pa rnams mthong //
T02D3766:127a-40: thub pa'i dge slong chag ston lo ts'a bas //
T02D3766:127a-41: byang chub gzhung lam 'di ni 'bad pas bsgyur //
T02D3766:127a-42: nyes kun bzod gsol dge bas bdag gzhan rnams //
T02D3766:127a-43: sgrib bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog /
T02D3766:127a-44: kha che'i mkhan po chen po chos kyi rje sh'akya
T02D3766:127a-45: shr'i bha dra las mnyan nas bod yul dbus kyi
T02D3766:127a-46: sde snod 'dzin pa chag lo ts'a ba dge slong
